document_data.name: Rorst Amandon
document_data.mainbody: Battlelord '''Rorst Amandon''' was a member of the [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|Council of Lords]] in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Rorst proved to be an influential member of the Council. His title of Battlelord gave him supreme command of the military forces in Zhentil Keep. He openly denounced both [[Manshoon]] and the [[Zhentarim]] and ultimately died a slow and agonizing death by poison in the {{YearlinkName|1334}}. Manshoon was widely suspected of being behind his death.

Rorst lived with his family in their estate in the southeast corner of Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]].
document_data.Relationships: Rorst's only son was [[Syal Amandon]] who inherited his seat on the Council upon his death.
